infoMessage:
Hello, I'm a bot that creates syntax trees. I may have more functions in the future. I'm based Andr√© Eisenbach's jsSyntaxTree, so if you need help figuring out how to build a tree, check his website at https://www.ironcreek.net/syntaxtree/.

I am designed by Smashhoof#5917, and the source code can be found here: https://github.com/moorebrendanr/LingBot-discord
helpMessage:
**/help:** Show this help message.
**/info:** About this bot.
**/tree:** Create a syntax tree.
